entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Mont-Laurier

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
